Name: Forsaken Generation
About the game: Old School Turn Based Rpg Made With Rpgmaker Mv. Sci-fi & Fantasy storyline 30+ Hrs Of Gameplay 20+ Dungeons to Explore 7 different characters to choose from. (+ 2 Hidden Characters to find) Each one brings their own TACTICS/BUFF to the combat. Challenging Hardcore Rpg. (no hand-holding Here) Utilize different ROW BUFFS effectively in combat YOU must decide whether to DPS or HEAL to SURVIVE. Flexible TARGETING in combat; to AOE or FOCUS FIRE can be critical in COMBAT. Terrax Lighting Effects Yanfly & Moghunter Plugins ANDROID APP INCLUDED FREE !
